title: Orthopedic Classification App
description:
Orthopedic Surgery Classification & Fractures App is designed for orthopedic residents, specialists and medical students interested in the study of orthopedic surgery and the classification of fractures and orthopedic diseases.

Orthopedic surgery classification app contains all classification systems of bone fractures such as the classification of humeral head fractures (Neer classification) and the classification of orthopedic diseases such as the classification of femoral head osteonecrosis (Vicat classification).

The Orthopedic Classification application was divided into two main part:
1. Fractures Classification.
2. Classification of orthopedic diseases.

Each section was classified according to anatomical regions (shoulder - elbow - wrist and hand - pelvis and hip - knee - Ankle and foot).
The classification was presented briefly by means of tables in an easy-to-understand manner, and provided with schematic and x-ray.

The application does not need an internet connection to work.
The application will be updated periodically, adding new and updated information and improving the performance of the application.
You can also search the app by classification name or fracture type.

Pro version Features:
1.	Totally Ads- Free
2.	Add to favorite feature
3.    More Classification systems

summary: Orthopedic Surgery & Fractures Classification Systems in Orthopedic Surgery
